DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate generic emtricitabine ( FTC ) plus adefovir dipivoxil Chinese naive HBV related cirrhosis patient . Patients divide 2 group : compensate HBV related cirrhosis patient decompensated HBV related cirrhosis patient .
DOC.brief_title: Emtricitabine Plus Adefovir Dipivoxil Naive Chinese HBV Related Cirrhosis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Generic emtricitabine ( FTC ) approve treatment naive chronic hepatitis B ( CHB ) patient China . Yet data limit agent plus adefovir dipivoxil cirrhosis patient . The investigator design trial test effect FTC plus adefovir dipivoxil Chinese naive compensate decompensated HBV related cirrhosis patient .
